pullRequest.title: Replace the GraylogSchemaFields class
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
The Graylog Security Team has been working on a standardized set of fields for the Graylog Schema.  This change re-organizes the field definitions to more closely align with the way the Security Team is documenting them.  This change also switches from using a class with static strings to enums.
Schema definitions can be found (internally) here: https://graylogdocumentation.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GENERAL/pages/711000065/Graylog+Information+Model+Entites
How Has This Been Tested?
New code builds successfully.
Screenshots (if appropriate):
N/A
Types of changes

 Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
 New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
 Refactoring (non-breaking change)
 Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)

Checklist:

 My code follows the code style of this project.
 My change requires a change to the documentation.
 I have updated the documentation accordingly.
 I have read the CONTRIBUTING document.
 I have added tests to cover my changes.

commit.message:
Replace the GraylogSchemaFields class with a collection of enums for standard schema fields.

The Graylog Security Team has been working on a standardized set of fields for the Graylog Schema.  This change re-organizes the field definitions to more closely align with the way the Security Team is documenting them.  This change also switches from using a class with static strings to enums.

Schema definitions can be found (internally) here: https://graylogdocumentation.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GENERAL/pages/711000065/Graylog+Information+Model+Entites
Convert from enums to classes of Strings

nodes.bodyText:
@waab76 - I'm wondering, if this is refer back to ApplicationFields.APPLICATION_SSO_SIGNONMODE and all the events will refer to Event fields..etc.
all the user_id in the PR, must refer to UserFields.java(USER_ID) isn't it ?
